document.full_text: portugal will formalize its request for a european union rescue package that could reach 85 billion euros ($122 billion) on thursday and a deal could be reached before a june 5 election, officials said.
document.title: portugal to formalize aid request, help seen by june
lines_and_colors: portugal will formalize its request for a european union rescue package that could reach 85 billion euros ($122 billion) on thursday and a deal could be reached before a june 5 election, officials said.
